trans-unit.source: Provides real-time spell-checking functionality to text-editing controls, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供实时拼写检查功能于文本编辑控件，如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To enable the spelling checker, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` on a text-editing control.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用拼写检查器，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`文本编辑控件上。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this spelling checker is enabled, misspelled words are underlined by using a red wavy line, as shown in the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: 启用此拼写检查器后下, 图中所示，通过使用红色的波浪线，带有下划线拼写错误的单词。

trans-unit.source: Spelling checker is supported only when WPF provides a default dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 WPF 提供了默认字典时，被支持拼写检查器。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], WPF provides dictionaries for English, French, German, and Spanish.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，WPF 为英语、 法语、 德语和西班牙语提供字典。

trans-unit.source: ![Textbox with spell-checking](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "Textbox with spell-checking") To add a custom dictionary, add the location of the lexicon file to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.CustomDictionaries%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: ![具有拼写检查的 Textbox](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "具有拼写检查的 Textbox")要添加自定义词典，添加到词典文件的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.CustomDictionaries%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.CustomDictionaries%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spell checking.
trans-unit.target: 获取的词典的集合用于自定义的拼写检查的文件位置。

trans-unit.source: Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are text files that have a .lex extension.
trans-unit.target: 自定义词典使用词典文件，它们都是扩展名为.lex 的文本文件。

trans-unit.source: Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling.
trans-unit.target: 词典文件的每一行包含作为合法拼写接受的单个字符。

trans-unit.source: The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to.
trans-unit.target: 该文件的第一行可以指定字典适用于一个区域设置标识符 (LCID)。

trans-unit.source: If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定区域设置，字典适用于所有语言。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Locale IDs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[区域设置 Id](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示针对英语词典文件的前几行。

trans-unit.source: ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or for any class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>, specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the CustomDictionaries collection.
trans-unit.target: ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ```若要指定一个或多个自定义字典中的是否存在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>或派生自任何类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>，通过将文件的 URI 添加到 CustomDictionaries 集合指定词典文件的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using <xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A> to add a file to the CustomDictionaries collection causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用<xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A>将文件添加到 CustomDictionaries 集合会引发异常。</xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use <xref:System.Collections.IList.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A> to update the collection.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.Collections.IList.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>以更新集合。</xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IList.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lexicon files can be included in the application as content files installed on the local computer or as resource files compiled into a local referenced assembly.
trans-unit.target: 词典文件可以包含为本地计算机上安装的内容文件也可以作为资源文件编译为本地应用程序中引用程序集。

trans-unit.source: You can reference the file by using pack URIs.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用包 Uri 引用的文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的包 Uri](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To enable the spelling checker, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or on any class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用拼写检查器，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>或从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>派生的任何类上</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All custom dictionaries for that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> are used in addition to the default spelling checker.
trans-unit.target: 所有自定义字典中的是否存在，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>除默认拼写检查器使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the spelling checker, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>.
trans-unit.target: 拼写检查器有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>

trans-unit.source: The collection of lexicon file locations.
trans-unit.target: 词典文件位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.CustomDictionaries*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.CustomDictionaries*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.CustomDictionaries*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spelling checkers on a specified text-editing control.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指定的文本编辑控件中的自定义拼写检查器的词典文件位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are simple text files that have a .lex extension.
trans-unit.target: 自定义词典使用词典文件，它们都是扩展名为.lex 的简单文本文件。

trans-unit.source: Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling.
trans-unit.target: 词典文件的每一行包含作为合法拼写接受的单个字符。

trans-unit.source: The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to.
trans-unit.target: 该文件的第一行可以指定字典适用于一个区域设置标识符 (LCID)。

trans-unit.source: If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定区域设置，字典适用于所有语言。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Locale IDs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[区域设置 Id](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示针对英语词典文件的前几行。

trans-unit.source: ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or any class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>, specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the <xref:System.Collections.IList> returned by the GetCustomDictionaries method.
trans-unit.target: ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ```若要指定一个或多个自定义字典中的是否存在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>或派生自任何类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>，通过添加到文件的 URI 中指定的词典文件的位置<xref:System.Collections.IList>GetCustomDictionaries 方法返回。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: To enable the spelling checker, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or on any class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用拼写检查器，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>或从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>派生的任何类上</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All custom dictionaries for that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> are used in addition to the default spelling checker.
trans-unit.target: 所有自定义字典中的是否存在，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>除默认拼写检查器使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the spelling checker, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>.
trans-unit.target: 拼写检查器有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>

trans-unit.source: The text-editing control whose collection of lexicon files is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 检索其集合词典文件的文本编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of lexicon file locations.
trans-unit.target: 词典文件位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: The textBoxBase is .
trans-unit.target: The textBoxBase is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the spelling checker is enabled on the specified text-editing control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否对指定的文本编辑控件启用拼写检查器。

trans-unit.source: The text-editing control to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的文本编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: Example controls include <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 示例控件包括<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the spelling checker is enabled on the text-editing control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在文本编辑控件; 上启用拼写检查器否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The textBoxBase is .
trans-unit.target: The textBoxBase is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the spelling checker is enabled on this text-editing control, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否对此文本编辑控件，如已启用拼写检查器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有专用的只写附加的属性使用情况。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>, and *boolValue* is either `true` or `false` (case insensitive).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用于设置该属性的语法是`<` *textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue*`" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是派生自的类对象元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>，和*boolValue*是`true`或`false`（不区分大小写）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: To set the property as an attached property in code, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SetIsEnabled%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要为附加属性在代码中设置该属性，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SetIsEnabled%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SetIsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no matching `GetIsEnabled` accessor.
trans-unit.target: 不存在匹配`GetIsEnabled`访问器。

trans-unit.source: To get the value, get the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck> object from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.SpellCheck%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, and then get the value of the IsEnabled property from that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的值，获取当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>对象的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.SpellCheck%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，以及随后如何获取该<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck> IsEnabled 属性的值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.SpellCheck%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况，请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the spelling checker is enabled on the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在控件; 上启用拼写检查器否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the spelling checker on the specified text-editing control, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用拼写检查器上指定的文本编辑控件，如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method enables an attached property usage for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 这种方法实现的附加的属性使用情况<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A>中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况。

trans-unit.source: The text-editing control on which to enable or disable the spelling checker.
trans-unit.target: 在其上启用或禁用拼写检查器文本编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: Example controls include <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 示例控件包括<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether the spelling checker is enabled on the text-editing control.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否对该文本编辑控件启用拼写检查器。

trans-unit.source: Determines the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.
trans-unit.target: 确定由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

trans-unit.source: The spelling reform rules that are accessed by this method refer to the French and German spelling reforms of the 1990's.
trans-unit.target: 通过此方式访问的拼写修订规则指 1990 ' s 法语和德语拼写改革。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect when it is used with any other language.
trans-unit.target: 当将它用于任何其他语言，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: This method enables an attached property usage for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 这种方法实现的附加的属性使用情况<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform%2A>中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text-editing control to which the spelling checker is applied.
trans-unit.target: 拼写检查器应用到的文本编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: Example controls include <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 示例控件包括<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform*> value that determines the spelling reform rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform*>值，该值确定的拼写修订规则。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

trans-unit.source: The spelling reform rules that are determined by this property refer to the French and German spelling reforms.
trans-unit.target: 确定此属性的拼写修订规则是指法语和德语拼写改革。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect when it is used with any other language.
trans-unit.target: 当将它用于任何其他语言，则此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有专用的只写附加的属性使用情况。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>, and *enumValue* is a string name for a value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用于设置该属性的语法是`<` *textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue*`" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是派生自的类对象元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>，和*enumValue*是值的字符串名称<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: To set the property as an attached property in code, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SetSpellingReform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要为附加属性在代码中设置该属性，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SetSpellingReform%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SetSpellingReform%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no matching `GetSpellingReform` accessor.
trans-unit.target: 不存在匹配`GetSpellingReform`访问器。

trans-unit.source: To get the value, get the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck> object from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.SpellCheck%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, and then get the value of the SpellingReform property from that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的值，获取当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>对象的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.SpellCheck%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，以及随后如何获取该<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck> SpellingReform 属性的值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.SpellCheck%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况，请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.
trans-unit.target: 由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform"></xref> for French and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform"></xref> for German.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform"></xref>为法语和<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform"></xref>对于德语。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SpellCheck.SpellingReform*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
